name: Destroy the Dummies (itch)
description:
Destroy the Dummies is a simple yet difficult, third person, action, arcade style, series of challenges, with an interesting dark plot twist mid-game. In Destroy the Dummies, you the player, are tasked with destroying a variety of enemy types in an homage to the games of the early days of 3D graphics. Are you tough enough to overcome every challenge?

  • Numerous difficult challenges will test your fortitude.
  • Progression system, gain experience with every dummy you destroy, and upgrade your character!
  • Variety of enemy types to smash.
  • Collect various power ups to boost your abilities.
  • Discover the dark scary secret....

It has been a long journey, but after a year of hard work, I am happy to announce the completion of Destroy the Dummies, my first simple project as a solo developer. I am super excited for your feedback, be sure to leave a review or post your comments! And thank you so much for your support, I hope you enjoy!

- Nathan Montgomery
